startPageTitle: Apply to register as a Companies House authorised agent Welsh
useThisService: Use this service to register your business as an authorised agent with Companies House. Authorised agents are also known as Authorised Corporate Service Providers (ACSPs). Welsh
whoNeedsToRegister: Who needs to register as an authorised agent? Welsh
startFromDate: From XX DATE, individuals or organisations will need to register as a Companies House authorised agent to (do any of the following): Welsh
onBehalfClients: file on behalf of clients Welsh
formCompanies: form companies or registrable partnerships on behalf of clients Welsh
verifyIndentityForCH: verify someone's identity for Companies House Welsh
youMustBe: To apply, you must be one of the following for the business you are registering: Welsh
identifyBeforeYouCanUse: If you’re a sole trader, you’ll need to verify your identity for Companies House before you can use this service. Welsh
verifyIdentityLink: Verify your identity for Companies House. Welsh
giveDetailsText: to give details about your business, or yourself if you're a sole trader Welsh
startNameOfAML: the names of all Anti-Money Laundering (AML) supervisory bodies the business is registered with Welsh
startAMLNumbers: the AML membership numbers or IDs  Welsh
startPayFee: to pay the £XX registration fee using a credit or debit card Welsh
startCheckAMLParagraph: We will check the AML supervisory body has the same name and membership number for your business. If you are registered with the AML supervisory body as an individual, you will need to apply as a sole trader using your own name. Welsh
startTimeout: This service will time out if you do not use it for 60 minutes. You can save your answers and resume your application later. Welsh
guidenceLinkText: guidance about applying to register as a Companies House authorised agent Welsh
